title: Don't get caught out like Coleen - how to lock down your multiple social media accounts
text:
Coleen Rooney's social media feud with fellow football wife Rebekah Vardy has gripped the nation.

Yesterday, Rooney, who married to former England international Wayne Rooney, told her 1.3 million Twitter followers that she had spent five months attempting to work out who was sharing stories based on her personal social media posts.

She said she worked out that the stories were coming from the account of reality TV star Vardy, the wife of Leicester City striker and ex-England international Jamie Vardy, following a sting operation.

Rooney, 33, said she had a suspicion of who it might be and blocked everyone apart from an Instagram page belonging to Vardy from seeing her Instagram stories.

It's...
description: Coleen Rooney's social media feud with fellow football wife Rebekah Vardy has gripped the nation.
